content: Savings Credit Card Loans Seedly Asked by AnonymousAsked 2w agoIs there like a debt function that I can use in this app?I would like to keep track of my repayments and all.1 answerAnswerBump0

Huang Yixuan, Product Designer at SomewhereLevel 6. MasterAnswered 2w agoHi!If you open up a "Loan Account" in the second tab of your app, you can set the balance to negative, and subsequently, add "income transactions" to that account to keep track of your loan repayment!0 comments0
